pr_title: Move direction transformation and matrix3f to util math (need same package)

timeline.bodyText: Why is GlobalPos going into the dynamic package? Does it work with dynamics?
timeline.author: Sollace

replies.bodyText: Yes, this is like dynamic serializable uuid (used by villager brains) and does not implement Position or WorldPosition
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Maybe a different class name is in order, then. Because GlobalPos tells me that it works with BlockPos and nothing else.
replies.author: Sollace
